mapper.select: select project.id,proj_name,customer_name,customer_place,proj_place,employee.employee_name as proj_PM_name,e.employee_name as proj_Saleman,DATE_FORMAT(proj_presta_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as proj_presta_time,DATE_FORMAT(proj_preend_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as proj_preend_time, DATE_FORMAT(proj_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as proj_start_time,DATE_FORMAT(proj_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as proj_end_time,count(member.fk_employee_gh) as proj_num_of_people, proj_status,proj_type,proj_line,proj_money,proj_all_cost,proj_current_cost,proj_cooperation_model,proj_dev_model,proj_description,proj_end_type from project LEFT JOIN customer on project.fk_customer_id=customer.id LEFT JOIN employee on project.proj_PM_gh=employee.employee_gh LEFT JOIN employee as e on project.proj_Saleman=e.employee_gh LEFT JOIN member on member.fk_project_id=project.id and member.is_quit=0 LEFT JOIN milestone on project.id = milestone.fk_project_id and milestone.milestone_status=( select case when ((select count(*) from milestone where milestone.milestone_status="严重延后") > 0) then "严重延后" when ((select count(*) from milestone where milestone.milestone_status="延后中") > 0) then "延后中" when ((select count(*) from milestone where milestone.milestone_status="正常进行") > 0) then "进行中" else null end milestone_status from milestone group by milestone.fk_project_id limit 1) group by project.id
